name: Manzil Tote
description: A beautiful heritage-inspired tote bag featuring traditional Indian architectural motifs and cultural elements. Perfect for carrying your essentials with a touch of desi pride.
care: 100% organic cotton. Machine wash cold with like colors. Air dry recommended. Iron on medium heat.
dimensions: 40cm W × 35cm H × 10cm D. Handle drop: 25cm. Perfect for daily essentials.

name: 90's Aesthetic Tote Bag
description: A nostalgic 90's inspired tote bag with vintage Bollywood aesthetics. Combines retro charm with modern functionality for the perfect throwback style.
care: 100% organic cotton. Machine wash cold separately. Air dry for best results. Iron on reverse side.
dimensions: 40cm W × 35cm H × 10cm D. Handle drop: 25cm. Retro design meets modern utility.
